basics.name: Ujjwal Ojha
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a Web Application Developer with hands on experience in PHP, JavaScript, Node.js etc in the last 4 years. Recently, I have also started on DevOps with some experience on Docker, Ansible, Capistrano etc. I have recently started following Agile practices in software development life cycle. I also have fair experience working with SPAs in Angular 1 and Vue.js. I am also highly interested on Microservices architecture. These days, I have been exploring Domain Driven Design.

work.summary: LogPoint is a global security analytics company founded in Denmark in 2008 and focussing on SIEM solution (Security Information and Event Management) for log management and advanced analytics.
highlights: Create a bridging API which connects one system to multiple remote systems
Interact with other team of developers for API compatibility and smoothely develop new features maintaining compatibility.

work.summary: IntroCept is a startup company established with a vision to innovate and deliver solutions to the existing problems with a strong belief that their team and unique business culture can make it possible.
highlights: Practice continuous delivery and Agile to deliver software as quickly as possible to the end user.
Develop microservices to build scalable Saas systems.
Lead a team of developers together to deliver software solutions.

work.summary: I worked as a Software Engineer on multiple freelance projects.
I worked as a Software Engineer on Volunteers collaboration platform.
Hrevert is software Development Company which provides software solutions to enterprises.

education.institution: Orchid Intl. College(affiliated to Tribhuvan Univertisy)
